body_content.explanation: a kind of large deciduous tree (= one that loses its leaves in autumn and grows new ones in the spring) with brightly coloured, pointed leaves and round, prickly (= covered in sharp points) fruits :
examples: The grounds were thick with sweetgum and blackberry.
An aromatic gum is obtained by making incisions in the trunk of sweet gums.
A huge sweet gum tree had come crashing to earth during the storm.
